author: mrfwashere
content:
though the report is probably legit, you cannot really trust screenshots from unknown people

friend of mine was just hit by a new type of scam involving a reporting channel like this:

1) scammer reports the victim as a scammer using a fake screenshot
2) victim is banned from the server
3) scammer DMs them and uses the fact they were banned as leverage/authority to do something malicious

probably low risk for this server but worth being aware of
